thread.title: 5 Songs From Future’s “DS2” Earn New RIAA Gold & Platinum Certifications
thread.title_full: 5 Songs From Future’s “DS2” Earn New RIAA Gold & Platinum Certifications

author: Danny Schwartz
title: 5 Songs From Future’s “DS2” Earn New RIAA Gold & Platinum Certifications
text:
Home > Music > 5 Songs From Future’s “DS2” Earn New RIAA Gold & Platinum Certifications 5 Songs From Future’s “DS2” Earn New RIAA Gold & Platinum Certifications 6 0 1.8K Posted by Danny Schwartz , Jan 16, 2017 at 04:15pm "Where Ya At," "Stick Talk," "Trap Niggas," "Rich $ex," and "Thought It Was A Drought" all earned new RIAA certifications on the same day. 
Future's DS2 is widely accepted as a modern trap masterpiece. The accolades continue to roll in, even 18 months after its release. Five songs from DS2 reached new RIAA certifications on January 11th: "Where Ya At" feat. Drake was certified double platinum. "Stick Talk" was certified platinum. "Trap Niggas," "Rich $ex," and "Thought It Was A Drought" were all certified gold. 
Yes, it's true. The people are still bumping DS2 . Revisit the album here . Check out the full list of Future's RIAA certifications here .
